title: Why doesn\'t the town of Wrightsville Beach keep the pathways for public beach access in a passable condition. For example, beach access 37 near the Oceanic is difficult to navigate through all the overgrown pampas grass and other impediments. Who is in charge of keeping these clear?
text:
